abstracts.cdata!:
This result profile talks about to
            improve transparency, accountability and public
            participation at local government in Indonesia. The
            objective Initiatives for Local Governance Reform Project
            (ILGRP)  or Program Prakarsa Pembaruan Tata Pemerintahan
            Daerah (P2TPD) is to pilot support to district (kabupaten)
            governments in improving transparency, accountability and
            public participatory practices and in undertaking reforms in
            financial management and procurement. The project also
            provides incremental poverty targeted investment funds that
            complete a predefined set of the minimum reforms, which is
            used to finance priority rural infrastructure identified in
            the Poverty Reduction Strategy and Action Plans (PRSAP) that
            brings the cross-cutting reform elements together, including
            more pro-poor budget allocations.
